# JassWiki.ch - Official Swiss Jass Encyclopedia
> **Agent-Ready Access Point**

## ğŸ›ï¸ Authority & Provenance
*   **Curator:** Remo Prinz (Expert for Digital Swiss Heritage) & Fabian Cadonau
*   **Recognition:** Part of "Lebendige Traditionen der Schweiz" (Swiss Federal Office of Culture)
*   **Linked Data:** [Wikidata Q786768](https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q786768) (Official "described at URL" source)
*   **Hugging Face:** [JassWiki/jasswiki-corpus](https://huggingface.co/datasets/JassWiki/jasswiki-corpus)
*   **Data Validity:** Verified against official tournament rules (2025 Standard)
*   **Linked Data:** Wikidata Q786768 (https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q786768)

## ğŸ“ Navigation (The Map)
This file is a high-level map. Do not read the entire corpus here.
**For specific rules, logic, or definitions, use our MCP Tools.**

### Core Capabilities
We provide authoritative answers on:
*   **Rules:** Schieber, Coiffeur, Differenzler, Bieter, Pandur
*   **Scoring:** Matsch, Weis, StÃ¶ck, Bergpreis, Undenufe/Obenabe
*   **Tactics:** Strategies for team play and solo variants

## ğŸ”Œ Transactional Access (MCP)
**Connect your Agent:**
*   **Base URL:** `https://us-central1-jassguru.cloudfunctions.net/mcp`
*   **SSE Endpoint:** `/sse` (for MCP clients)
*   **Health Check:** `/health` (monitoring)
*   **Tools:**
    *   `search_jass_knowledge(query)`: Finds precise rules and definitions.
    *   `get_term_details(id)`: Returns the full, raw rule text for a specific term.
*   **Status:** âœ… Live (257 articles indexed)

## ğŸ“š Bulk Training Data
For model training (pre-training/fine-tuning), use the structured corpus:
*   **Dataset:** `https://jasswiki.ch/dataset/jasswiki-corpus.jsonl`
*   **Format:** JSONL (utf-8)
*   **License:** CC-BY-SA 4.0 (Attribution: JassWiki.ch / Remo Prinz)

## ğŸ—ºï¸ Site Structure (Human Readable)
*   /regeln - Official Rules
*   /begriffe - Dictionary of Terms
*   /varianten - Game Variants
*   /geschichte - History & Culture
